name: Enemy Stun and Death Animations
author: MoscowModder
info: A while back, someone (I forget who, sorry) gave me a script for custom enemy death animations, to get around ZC's hard-coded limitation of 4-frame animations. I cleaned that script up a bit, and added another part for stun animations. Now your enemies will clearly show when they're stunned, and make cool effects when they die. Enjoy!

setup:
Edit the three constants to fit your needs.If you already have a global script, put the line deathAnimations(); into your while(true) loop. Otherwise assign the "active" script to the slot of the same name.Go whack an enemy with the boomerang and kill it.

Requires stdExtra.zh
